Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 81st overall pick, by Manchester in 1975...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1980, off Fred Prahl (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1980, off Dale Gillard (CBC)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 3 runs on 4/18/1983...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 8/26/1983...
Injured on 5/29/1984 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1984, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 6/21/1985 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/4/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $4,651,300 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 4/3/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1986, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Gashouse on 4/21/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1987, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 8/22/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1991, hitting .517 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
